info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 3:20PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Prowers, Kiowa and northeastern Bent Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 316 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of showers and weak thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Wild Horse Point to 16 miles southwest of Granada. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Granada and Bristol around 335 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Holly and Hartman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
